title: Tools for detecting packing and encryption
content:
I'm doing a cert in malware analysis and I'm looking for some up to date tools to automate detection of packing and encryption to aid the reversing process.
I've found TitanMist however it seems quite dated, are there any other tools?
Thanks,

answers_data.content: Encrypted and compressed data have high entropy. Tools for visualizing the entropy of information in binary files include binvis.io and binwalk.

comments.text: Thanks Iâ€™ve been looking for this since I seen it used in a book I read

answers_data.content: If you're referring to native applications in particular then Detect it Easy is one of the better and more widely used options.

comments.text: Thanks, I'll give this a go! 23 hours last commit :)
